root.name: Turbo Charge
root.description: Reminiscent of earlier arcade racers like Chase HQ and OutRun, the later Turbo Charge was technically a lot sounder than those franchises various ports to the C64, with a very high speed, OutRuns branching paths, nice rollercoaster'y hills with jumps, tunnels and other impressive graphics and animations like the explosion when you hit a wall.Originally had the much less generic title "Borderline" according to a Zzap 64 preview, in reference to the games premise of getting to and from sanctuary at different countries borders.

similar_games.game: Chase H.Q. II: Special Criminal Investigation
